mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDS (PK_BOARDS, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER_ID, CREATE_DATE, PARENT_BOARDS) VALUES (#{pk_boards}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{parent_boards})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDS SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, WRITER_ID = #{writer_id}, PARENT_BOARDS = #{parent_boards} WHERE PK_BOARDS = #{pk_boards}
